title: The Colonel comes to Japan
brief_description: Provides a fascinating look at the highly successful marketing of the Kentucky Fried Chicken product in Japan, noting the modifications to the standard American approach adopted to suit the Japanese business philosophy and life style. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
